sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>good</radical> <radical>moon</radical> is a <kanji>bright</kanji> moon. Not just in terms of light, but in mood as well. Like, gee wiz, what a bright, happy moon.
meaningInfo: Picture the good, good bright moon. Shining and shimmering and smiling down at us on Earth.
readingMnemonic: It's so <kanji>bright</kanji> that you can see all the <reading>roe</reading> (<ja>ろう</ja>) in the sea glowing and reflecting the light like stars. And the tiny baby fishies inside the roe are smiling brightly back up at the moon!
readingInfo: Picture this scene like it's a Disney cartoon. The good moon is smiling brightly down at the roe which are smiling right back. They might even start singing a song!
